Ice::

She saw her trick wasn't working.  She growled and let her griffin 
mode take over.  Enraged, she flew off the ground and swiped at 
Megaton's face with her powerful polarbear claws. "I can take you on, 
mind tricks or not!" She slashed at him again and again. 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> 
> Megaton looks down at the melting rock beneath him. He reached down 
as if to
> scoop some out with his claws. In his eyes he had two fistfulls of 
lava, but
> in reality he had two claws of dirt. He pulled his claws back and 
threw the
> molten earth/ dirt at Ice. "You will move or you WILL be 
destroyed." he
> yells knowing that the "teddy" bear in front of him wasn't worth 
his effort.
> 
> Lunarpine stood up again, the hair on his back looked like 
needles. "Leave
> her alone monster" He yelled. The wolf fired a sonic howl at his 
nemesis
> hoping to stop the beast from reaching his objective.
> 
> Magaton was hit by a solid wave of force as the howl overcame 
him, "If thats
> your best than I haven't a worry." He swung a wing to the side 
creating a
> gust of wind sending the wolf rolling across the ground. The battle 
outside
> the Cybertronian fire was quickly becoming an embarasment to the 
smaller
> bots.
